hibernate-mapping.sql-query: delete from P2_LtrProcessingQ where LtrTypeID in (:ltrTypeIDList)

select A.[EISI MATTER #] from [PROBE EISI ACCT MGMT] A inner join P2_LU_Client CLN on A.[CLIENT NAME] = CLN.[ClientName] inner join CourtIS.dbo.[COURT_MASTER] CRT on A.[CourtID] = CRT.[CourtID] where [SEARCH LTR SENT] Is Null and [place date] > '2009-01-01' and ([acctid] is null or [acctid] not in ('711','715')) and [ADJ BAL] > 99 and [STATUS CODE1] not in ('CLCR','PS','PLX') and [CS HANDLER1] not in ('ROE') and A.[COURTID] not in (3316,3317,3318,3319,3320) and CLN.ClientMasterShortName not in (:clientExclusionList)

select A.[EISI MATTER #] from [PROBE EISI ACCT MGMT] A inner join P2_LU_Client CLN on A.[CLIENT NAME] = CLN.[ClientName] inner join CourtIS.dbo.[COURT_MASTER] CRT on A.[CourtID] = CRT.[CourtID] where [INSSPLM DATE] Is Null and [STATUS CODE1] = 'INSSPL' and [CS HANDLER1] = 'ROE' and A.[ADJ BAL] > 0 and A.[COURTID] not in (3316,3317,3318,3319,3320) and CLN.ClientMasterShortName not in (:clientExclusionList)

select A.[EISI MATTER #] from [PROBE EISI ACCT MGMT] A inner join P2_LU_Client CLN on A.[CLIENT NAME] = CLN.[ClientName] inner join CourtIS.dbo.[COURT_MASTER] CRT on A.[CourtID] = CRT.[CourtID] where [STATUS CODE1] = 'SRCH' and dod is not null and A.[COURTID] not in (3316,3317,3318,3319,3320) and CLN.ClientMasterShortName not in (:clientExclusionList) order by CRT.Zip, A.[CLIENT NAME]
select A.[EISI MATTER #] from [PROBE EISI ACCT MGMT] A where [STATUS CODE1] = 'OS' and dod is not null order by A.[CourtId]
select A.[EISI MATTER #] from [PROBE EISI ACCT MGMT] A where DateDiff(day,[CLM FILE DATE],:date) = 0 order by A.[EISI MATTER #]

select LtrTypeId, SourceColumn, RequestorColumn from P2_LtrTypes where BatchType = :batchType and SourceColumn in ( select '['+c.name+']' from syscolumns c inner join sysobjects o on o.id = c.id where o.name = 'Outgoing Letters Table') and RequestorColumn in ( select '['+c.name+']' from syscolumns c inner join sysobjects o on o.id = c.id where o.name = 'Outgoing Letters Table')
